column4: Any ideas why my 8.10 install is becoming abnormally slow at startup? I think it has something to do with initializing the multimedia controller
Well, how would I turn it off, considering that I'd have to modify startup procedure
i would disable the framebuffer/splash screen to look for any boot time error messages/clues as to whats going on.. If you have not allready done so

well it doesnt seem to have any errors though, but it just doesnt process, like, what happens, is that it goes to load the multimedia controler, and it takes about 10 seconds to load before it goes to load the other one
